document.full_text: al qaeda has appointed an egyptian militant as temporary leader and named a new head of operations following the killing of osama bin laden by u.s. commandos, al jazeera said wednesday, citing pakistani security sources.
document.title: al qaeda names adel as interim chief: al jazeera
lines_and_colors: al qaeda has appointed an egyptian militant as temporary leader and named a new head of operations following the killing of osama bin laden by u.s. commandos, al jazeera said wednesday, citing pakistani security sources.
